import { Form, Formik } from "formik"; import * as Yup from "yup"; export default function Step1() { return (

Personel info

Please provide your name, email address, and phone number.
{({ dirty, handleChange, handleSubmit, errors }) => { console.log(dirty); return (
Name {errors.name ? ( {errors.name} ) : null}
Email Address {errors.mail ? ( This field is required ) : null}
Phone Number {errors.phone ? ( This field is required ) : null}
); }}
); }
